snippet: Goodell, the N.F.L. commissioner, said at a rally in San Diego that the Chargers belonged in the city and that a new stadium would be “a perfect place for the Super Bowl.”
abstract: NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell supports San Diego Chargers new stadium plan.
lead_paragraph: Goodell, the N.F.L. commissioner, said at a rally in San Diego that the Chargers belonged in the city and that a new stadium would be “a perfect place for the Super Bowl.”

headline.main: Roger Goodell Praises San Diego at Chargers Stadium Rally
